Text: Dominion Volumes Cc In regard to our previous discussions regarding the floating tariff and related swap for the offshore floating production system financing we are now in the Phase II bidding process for Devils Tower Attached is the production profile for Devils Tower Can you run your analysis on the P volumes guaranteed firm volumes and advise us of your findings floating oil and gas tariffs I am available to meet with you today at pm pm or anytime tomorrow Friday Let me know what your schedule is like Thanks Lisa Druzbik Forwarded by Lisa DruzbikNAEnron on AM Kelli Little AM To Lisa nron cc Subject Dominion Volumes Lisa Ive attached the Dominion and Enron volume curves Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Kelli

Final Keystone Term Sheet Cc NonPrivilegedpst Team Attached is the final Keystone Term Sheet proposal to Northern Natural Gas NNG is still in the process of having the CA signed As soon as the CA is signed by NNG Tuesday at the earliest the attached Term Sheet will be delivered to NNG by Ned Higgins Thanks Lisa Druzbik

FW Final Keystone Term SheetNonPrivilegedpst Gerald FYI The paragraph on Firm Transportation Backhaul was revised to include secondary rights and tiered pricing and the Interruptible Transportation Forwardhaul was deleted Exhibit II was revised and Exhibit III was deleted as well Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Monday July PM To Higgins Ned Hilgert Chris Bieniawski Paul Vasquez Miguel Gregory Paul Wilson Garry D Cc Nemec Gerald Subject Final Keystone Term Sheet Importance High Team Attached is the final Keystone Term Sheet proposal to Northern Natural Gas NNG is still in the process of having the CA signed As soon as the CA is signed by NNG Tuesday at the earliest the attached Term Sheet will be delivered to NNG by Ned Higgins Thanks Lisa Druzbik

RE Final Keystone Term Sheet Cc NonPrivilegedpst Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday July PM To Druzbik Lisa Subject RE Final Keystone Term Sheet The term sheet looks fine Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Monday July PM To Nemec Gerald Subject FW Final Keystone Term Sheet Importance High Gerald FYI The paragraph on Firm Transportation Backhaul was revised to include secondary rights and tiered pricing and the Interruptible Transportation Forwardhaul was deleted Exhibit II was revised and Exhibit III was deleted as well Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Monday July PM To Higgins Ned Hilgert Chris Bieniawski Paul Vasquez Miguel Gregory Paul Wilson Garry D Cc Nemec Gerald Subject Final Keystone Term Sheet Importance High Team Attached is the final Keystone Term Sheet proposal to Northern Natural Gas NNG is still in the process of having the CA signed As soon as the CA is signed by NNG Tuesday at the earliest the attached Term Sheet will be delivered to NNG by Ned Higgins File NNG Keystone Term Sheet July IIdoc Thanks Lisa Druzbik

FW Napoleonville Land Sale KeystoneUnocal Deal Cc NonPrivilegedpst Eva FYI I called Mary Ogden today to followup on the status of the Napoleonville Land sale document filing sale to TX Brine Mary said that she is still trying to locate the documents She plans to finalize in one of two ways Our lawyers in Louisiana are going to send someone this week to check the Assumption Parish records to see what was actually recorded Mary sent an email to a former Enron Landman now AEP Robert Rose Ann Elizabeth told Mary that Robert may have a copy of the documents Thanks Lisa Original Message From Rainer Eva Sent Friday July AM To Van Hooser Steve Ogden Mary Cc Druzbik Lisa Johnson Patrick Subject RE Napoleonville Land Sale KeystoneUnocal Deal Any news on this We are having lunch with Texas Brine again today in about minutes if theres any news Id love to hear itThanks Eva Original Message From Van Hooser Steve Sent Thursday July AM To Ogden Mary Cc Rainer Eva Druzbik Lisa Johnson Patrick Subject FW Napoleonville Land Sale KeystoneUnocal Deal Mary Would you call AEW and find out where we can find a copy of the Tract B sale from Enron Storage Company to LRCI Inc here in our officeI know you are planning to call Sandi Braband according to the message below AEW must have done the work Also would you please call Keith Daigle I dont want to use Locke Lidell on this and ask him to obtain a file stamped copy of all ESC conveyances to LRCI that are filed in the Assumption Parish Records Keiths phone number is or Would you also ask Keith how he is coming on the Sorrento Right of Way Agreement that I sent him on July We need to have that back by the time Patrick Johnson returns next Monday Please give him a gentle prod Thanks Steve Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Wednesday July PM To Van Hooser Steve Cc Rainer Eva Ogden Mary Bieniawski Paul Higgins Ned Subject Napoleonville Land Sale KeystoneUnocal Deal Steve I have a few comments and inquiries as follows An update on Tract B sale to TX Brine Paul Bieniawski spoke to Ann Elizabeth this afternoon and she told him that the law firm Locklidell sp dropped the ball and failed to file the appropriate papers with the authorities The papers should have been filed by now How can we confirm the filing Do you have contacts at Locklidell sp Can we call the authorities Proposed sale of Tracts A B A Since LRCI now owns the land as a result of the merger does Enron have the authority to sale the property and thus keep of any sales proceeds Also I meant to mention to you earlier that I am working on another deal KeystoneUnocal which incorporates both compression and storage Northern Natural Gas is involved as well and we need your help in generating a term sheet I will call you tomorrow to discuss further Thanks Lisa Druzbik

Project Gallup Cc NonPrivilegedpst JeanCris As a followup to our meeting last week I reviewed the Gallup closing documents and I spoke to Gerald Nemec today regarding whether Enron Corp issued a financial guarantee to ECHO funded by NatwestEquity Investor Patty Melcher to compensate for the risk from closing to the start of operations Gerald Nemec and Mark Knippa both confirmed that Enron did not issue a financial guarantee even though the project closed prior to the start of operations At the time of closing construction was about complete and the legal documents were in place stating a definitive start date The definitive start date ensured that funds would flow regardless of whether the facility was operational Essentially TW was on the hook for the annual payment etc beginning on the start date outlined in the legal agreement The investors were comfortable with the projects progress at the time of closing and they basically were willing to take TWEnron credit risk without a financial guarantee Let me know if you have any other inquiries Thanks Lisa

Hubbard Restructuring Closing Documents Cc Gerald In your spare time I need your help in locating a copy of the Hubbard Compression deal restructured in June closing documents Please let me know and I can come by to make a copy Thanks Lisa Druzbik

LOI Outline Nicor Compression DealGerald This afternoon the Compression team is headed to Chicago for a Friday meeting with Nicor We have not yet progressed to the point of providing Nicor a LOI Instead one of the items they plan to discuss is the attached outline of the LOI in order to give Nicor an indication of what would be included if and when the deal progresses Could you review the attached LOI Outline and provide any comments Thanks Lisa Druzbik

Nicor LOI Cc Gerald Per our earlier discussion attached is the latest Nicor LOI for your review and editing I will work on the Power Supplement and forward to you ASAP Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Lisa Druzbik

RE NICOR LOI Cc Gerald Thanks As discussed earlier I accepted all of your changes except the item in Section In the meantime we have reworked the language in NonBinding Sections to further clarify the power rates and terms Please review Also the Term language in red in Binding Section below seems to give NICOR an out and seems to contradict the exclusivity clause Please explain Term This Agreement shall remain in force and effect until the earliest to occur of the following events i an entity or entities other than the Parties enter into a definitive agreements for the compression services or ii April the Term The provisions of Section Confidentiality shall survive any termination of this Agreement as necessary for them to expire according Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday November AM To Druzbik Lisa Cc Hilgert Chris Subject NICOR LOI Attached is the LOI with my comments redlined Let me know if you have any questions File Nicor LOI Novreddoc

FW Nicor DocumentsGerald Chris would like to submit a Letter of Interest as well as a Letter of Intent to NICOR later today Can you please review the attached Letter of Interest and provide any comments Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Hilgert Chris Sent Thursday November PM To Higgins Ned Druzbik Lisa Hinze Ryan Freeman Ben Subject Nicor Documents Folks Good work on the documents that youve pulled together to get to Nicor and to Shell Capital I have added the Letter of Interest along with slightly modified versions of the others attached Review make any minor changes and lets get these out to Shell Capital Risks Mitigants Schedule and Nicor Letter of Interest Letter of Intent and Schedule today I would have Gerald take a look at the Letter of Interest prior to sending it to make sure that I didnt misrepresent anything Sorry about the hold up on my end from being on the road Thanks Chris Hilgert Enron Compression Services Work Cell wwwenroncomcompression

UNOCAL TERM SHEET Cc Gerald We are planning to provide a revised Term Sheet to Unocal sometime tomorrow Can you please review the attached revised Term Sheet and provide any comments It is not that different from the initial Term Sheet you reviewed and approved in September Revised Term Sheet Summary of changes Term Sheet issued Sept VS Revised Term Sheet Thanks Lisa Druzbik

RE UNOCAL TERM SHEETThanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday November AM To Druzbik Lisa Subject RE UNOCAL TERM SHEET Lisa My only comments would be in the Firm Transport section Since ENA can not directly provide firm transport on NNG I would rephrase it as ENA would arrange for Firm Transport on NNG As we discussed before Unocal would need to enter directly into the FT with NNG or ENA would have to contract for the FT and then release it to Unocal pursuant to the capacity release procedures which would include posting and bidding requirements Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Monday November PM To Nemec Gerald Cc Hilgert Chris Higgins Ned Subject UNOCAL TERM SHEET Gerald We are planning to provide a revised Term Sheet to Unocal sometime tomorrow Can you please review the attached revised Term Sheet and provide any comments It is not that different from the initial Term Sheet you reviewed and approved in September Revised Term Sheet File Unocal Term Sheet Novdoc Summary of changes Term Sheet issued Sept VS Revised Term Sheet File Unocal Term Sheet Sep vs Novxls Thanks Lisa Druzbik
Unocal Term SheetFYI Attached is the final Term Sheet printed on ECS letterhead to be mailed to Unocal first thing tomorrow morning Let me know if you have any questions or comments Thanks Lisa

FW Texas Brine DocumentsDASH Original Message From Rainer Eva Sent Tuesday November PM To Druzbik Lisa Cc Nemec Gerald Mrha Jean Subject Texas Brine Documents Document Signature Cash Sale Form Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Easements Agreement Jean MrhaJulie Gomez if needed DASH Rick BuyDave Gorte Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Mark Haedicke John LavoratoLouise Kitchen Jeff McMahonRay Bowen The DASH may need a legal risk rating attachment and Gerald can draft that quickly if needed I hope it wont be needed though given that there is really nothing at risk Also Dave Gorte may need to adjust it when he sees the DASH so I would begin by emailing a copy to him Here they are

RE LOI Oakhill Cc Gerald See attached for more changes in BLUE Per my earlier phone message I removed the sentence on gas compression in Section and further clarified the electric only tone of the section Please advise Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October PM To Druzbik Lisa Subject RE LOI Oakhill Lisa Your changes look fine to me I added the sentence to make it clear that ECS would not be owning and operating that portion of the equipment It wasnt clear to me from the section which indicate we will be arranging for the installation of the compressors Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Wednesday October PM To Nemec Gerald Cc Hilgert Chris Freeman Ben Knippa Mark Subject RE LOI Oakhill Gerald Thanks for your comments Ive made a few revisions hightlighted in BLUE in particular Ive clarified the Capital Expenditures Section we want to differentiate the transmission line from the remainder of the capital estimates We are still working on the items in red and in yellow File Oakhill LOI Lisadoc One question for you in Section Why did you add the following sentence Oakhill would maintain ownership and responsibility for all maintenance of the reciprocating gas compressors throughout the contract term Its not clear to me why wed include a sentence on gas compression Let me know Thanks Lisa Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October AM To Druzbik Lisa Cc Hilgert Chris Knippa Mark Subject LOI Oakhill Lisa I made significant revisions to this form Please review and lets discuss File OakhillLOIdoc

RE LOI Oakhill Cc Gerald Thanks for your comments Ive made a few revisions hightlighted in BLUE in particular Ive clarified the Capital Expenditures Section we want to differentiate the transmission line from the remainder of the capital estimates We are still working on the items in red and in yellow One question for you in Section Why did you add the following sentence Oakhill would maintain ownership and responsibility for all maintenance of the reciprocating gas compressors throughout the contract term Its not clear to me why wed include a sentence on gas compression Let me know Thanks Lisa Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October AM To Druzbik Lisa Cc Hilgert Chris Knippa Mark Subject LOI Oakhill Lisa I made significant revisions to this form Please review and lets discuss File OakhillLOIdoc

Oakhill Compression Project LOI Cc Gerald As discussed yesterday we are targeting to deliver an LOI to Oakhill Pipeline this Thursday morning Please review the attached LOI Draft and provide any comments Items in red are still being worked and will be confirmed by tomorrow afternoon Please contact me with any questions Thanks Lisa Druzbik

Unocal Term Sheet Cc NonPrivilegedpst Gerald Per our conversation yesterday attached is the Unocal Term Sheet for your review and comment This is a nonbinding proposal Note that the items in red are either questionable items or ratesprices that need to be confirmed andor filled in The compression guys are meeting with Unocal tomorrow Friday early afternoon to discuss the project and term sheet Please advise Thanks Lisa Druzbik

RE Unocal Term Sheet Cc NonPrivilegedpst Gerald Thanks for the feedback Attached is the latest version of the Term Sheet changes are in BLUE for your review Chris and Ned are meeting with Unocal early this afternoon Thanks Lisa Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Thursday September PM To Druzbik Lisa Cc Higgins Ned Hilgert Chris Freeman Ben Subject RE Unocal Term Sheet I have reviewed the term sheet and I am fine with the form I did spot a potential issue with the Transport piece of the proposal If ENA holds transport on NNG it cannot simply sell use of that capacity to Unocal The shipper of record with NNG needs to hold title to the gas that is being transported For Unocal to utilize this capacity they would need to either directly contract with NNG for such capacity or ENA would acquire the capacity then Capacity Release the capacity to Unocal The Capacity Release would be subject to NNG bulletin board posting requirements Let me know if you want to discuss further Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Thursday September PM To Nemec Gerald Cc Higgins Ned Hilgert Chris Freeman Ben Subject Unocal Term Sheet Importance High Gerald Per our conversation yesterday attached is the Unocal Term Sheet for your review and comment This is a nonbinding proposal Note that the items in red are either questionable items or ratesprices that need to be confirmed andor filled in File Unocal Keystone Term Sheet Sepdoc The compression guys are meeting with Unocal tomorrow Friday early afternoon to discuss the project and term sheet Please advise Thanks Lisa Druzbik
